rfp_specifications.security_features: Secure print, user authentication, data encryption

scenario2.selection_justification: Office Technology Solutions offers the best overall value with a competitive price under budget ($7,845), exceeds all technical requirements, includes a 3-year warranty, provides 3-week delivery, and includes all requested features. While Enterprise Print Solutions has superior specifications, their price exceeds the budget constraint of $8,000.

issues: Required by date listed as 'ASAP' which is not acceptable per policy section 1.1.f
Total amount exceeds $5,000 requiring competitive bidding
required_corrections: Include minimum of two written quotes per policy section 2.1

issues: Professional services purchase requires detailed scope of work document per policy section 4.2
Training service price ($12,500) exceeds standard catalog price ($10,000)
required_corrections: Attach detailed scope of work document for training services
Provide justification for price exceeding standard catalog price or adjust to catalog price
